issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:

Text tables are not correctly displayed in Android "userSpinner"-text.
This bug also occurs on "userSpinner"-text 2.

Steps:

1. Run Refactored KitchenSink
2. In "Controls" module press on "Picker".
3. Clickon Android "userSpiner"-text and/or "userSpiner"-text 2.

Expected results:

Should see one table with three columns(for"userSpinner"-text) and three tables with 3 columns each and header should be "SOME LAYOUT EXAMPLES"( for "userSpinner"- text 2.).

Actual results:
For "userSpinner"-text only two columns in the table visible.
For "userSpinner"- text 2 two tables have only two columns.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Text columns are not correctly displayed in Android "user spinner"
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207271312
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.1.v20120727140110
Device: LG VS910 4G (2.3.6)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
